DOC.brief_summary: Background : Pancreatogenic diabetes result total pancreatectomy ( TP ) one reason form surgery technique seldom perform . However , progress medical surgical care nowadays , patient undergo TP could receive good care endocrine exocrine insufficiency . In addition , good understand benign pancreatic tumor pancreatic neuroendocrine tumor , patient diffuse pancreatic disease diagnose ; hence , performance TP may rise . Nevertheless , quality life patient pancreatogenic diabetes TP still currently controversial . Purpose : The purpose study ( 1 ) explore association fatigue , self-care activity quality life patient pancreatogenic diabetes total pancreatectomy ; ( 2 ) compare data diabetic patient pancreaticoduodenectomy . Method : A correlational comparative cross-sectional approach use . The data collect structured questionnaire via purposive sample 120 subject outpatient pancreatic surgical department . Inclusion criteria patient : ( 1 ) age 20 , ( 2 ) conscious clear , communicate Mandarin Taiwanese , ( 3 ) agree participate study sign inform consent . Exclusion criteria patient diagnosed cancer pancreatic cancer active treatment . Data go propensity score match analyze use descriptive statistic , pair t-test , Chi square test , Pearson 's correlation , conditional logistic regression . Anticipated achievement : The anticipated achievement study understand relationship fatigue , self-care activity , quality life patient pancreatogenic diabetes pancreas surgery . In addition , study , influence diabetes patient pancreatic tumor resection explore ; factor influence population 's quality life examine . By fill knowledge gap , intervention plan accordingly help improve population 's quality life .
